org.apache.hadoop.hbase.procedure2

Interface ProcedureMetrics


  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface ProcedureMetrics
    With this interface, the procedure framework provides means to collect following set of metrics per procedure type for all procedures:
    • Count of submitted procedure instances
    • Time histogram for successfully completed procedure instances
    • Count of failed procedure instances
    Please implement this interface to return appropriate metrics.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Counter getFailedCounter() 
      Counter getSubmittedCounter() 
      Histogram getTimeHisto() 

    • Method Detail

      • getSubmittedCounter

        Counter getSubmittedCounter()
        Returns:
        Total number of instances submitted for a type of a procedure

      • getTimeHisto

        Histogram getTimeHisto()
        Returns:
        Histogram of runtimes for all successfully completed instances of a type of a procedure

      • getFailedCounter

        Counter getFailedCounter()
        Returns:
        Total number of instances failed for a type of a procedure
